statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{2} + 2 \, x + 5 , 3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + x + 5 , -3 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x + 15 , -5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 1 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
